Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
BoardView, Serializable
public class Board extends Object implements BoardView
Modifiable implementation of BoardView
See Also:
  • ObjectOutputStream
  • Serialized Form
Implementation Note:
Java Serialization automatically takes care of keeping multiple references to a single object correct on deserialization: "Multiple references to a single object are encoded using a reference sharing mechanism so that graphs of objects can be restored to the same shape as when the original was written." Using invalidTile's reference as a marker should be deserialized correctly.
